description: This signature Conrad Anker sock was built to keep up with all your outdoor excursions. The Athlete Edition Mountaineer OTC Socks feature their most advanced Indestructawool technology for enhanced durability and their 4 Degree elite fit system for an unmatched performance fit. Plus, achilles straps for extra protection and warmth. Make every adventure a little more comfortable with these performance socks in your corner.
name: Smartwool Athlete Edition Mountaineer Over The Calf Socks - Mens

specs.value: 50% Merino Wool, 12% Nylon, 34% Recycled Nylon, 4% Elastane
